name: Elysium
description: A paradise for the heroic and virtuous after death.

name: Tír na nÓg
description: The Land of Youth, a place of eternal beauty and joy.

name: The Garden of Eden
description: The first paradise, home of Adam and Eve.

name: Avalon
description: A mystical island where King Arthur was taken to heal.

name: Jambudvīpa
description: The central continent in Hindu and Jain cosmology.

name: Xanadu
description: A luxurious and magical city of Kubla Khan.

name: Heavenly Jerusalem
description: A perfect city promised in the Book of Revelation.

name: Iram of the Pillars
description: A lost city in the Arabian desert destroyed by divine wrath.

name: Mag Mell
description: A paradise across the western sea, ruled by gods and heroes.

name: Sambhala
description: A kingdom of enlightened rulers destined to bring peace to Earth.

name: Kunlun Mountains
description: A mythical mountain range housing goddesses and immortals.

name: Tlālōcān
description: A lush afterlife ruled by the rain god Tlaloc.

name: Mount Meru
description: The sacred central world-mountain of the universe.

name: Naraka
description: The underworld of punishment before rebirth.

name: Paititi
description: A legendary hidden city of gold in the Andes.

name: Ys
description: A drowned city off the coast of Brittany, swallowed by the sea.

name: Utopia
description: An imaginary perfect society with ideal laws and justice.

name: Sankara Stones Village
description: Home of mystical stones said to hold immense power.

name: Diyu
description: The Chinese realm of the dead where souls are judged and punished.

name: Yomi
description: The land of the dead in Japanese lore, ruled by Izanami.
